niagara.connection_server
Class ResultTransmitter

java.lang.Object
  niagara.connection_server.ResultTransmitter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, Schedulable
public class ResultTransmitter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Schedulable

This is the thread for transmitting out the results of a query to the client Every query that gets submitted to the server has a corresponding resultTranmitting thread

handleAccumQuery

private void handleAccumQuery()
                       throws ShutdownException,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException,
                              java.io.IOException
Function to "handle" an Accumulate Query. This function is run in this class's thread and basically sits on top of a Accumulate Query. The function of this function/thread is to pull results from the accumulate operator and update the Accumulate File Directory.

Throws:
ShutdownException
java.lang.InterruptedException
java.io.IOException
